content.label: Why is it y‚Äôall updating this game and not updating MM3 which is much better?

I‚Äôve started to watch Motorsport Manager PC again, so I started playing this game again while I wait to December when Motorsport Manager 3 goes free, since the PC game isn‚Äôt cheap. First thing I want to say, currently I‚Äôm in tier 5 and the game is NOT pay to win. Tiers 1-3 are pretty fast, but from then in it gets a bit grindy, and I heard tier 6 is VERY grindy. So far I‚Äôve been enjoying the game, but the thing you NEED is OP driver combos and strategies. Unless you have a super good driver, you need a maxed car to get pole and the win. I do have a super good driver, and makes the game less frustrating.  It‚Äôs a great game overall, but the thing that makes it a 4 star is the game crashing when you go to the car select screen. (The devs know this so I hope it gets fixed.) The final bug is the whenever you finish the race and go to fix a part, sometimes the game randomly goes to like 0 FPS. Other than that awesome game, F1 Manager is garbage, I would recommend this game if you like Motorsport Manager games and don‚Äôt have any yet.
This game is a must play!!!
Way more challenging!!! Love it!!

For some reason every time I open the game it pastes whatever info I have recently copied. I‚Äôm not sure where it‚Äôs pasting it to, however it‚Äôs a bit concerning that the game is able to access my copied data....serious security breach. Fix this problem immediately or I will report it to Apple.

The game itself is great, I have always loved racing. I like my cars to look good but whenever I go to the livery store, the game always crashes and kicks me out, this is on iOS by the way. Please fix this bug.
I absolutely love this game but since the recent update it wont let me in the game, it just crashes

No joke it‚Äôs the best manager game out there.

title.label: If this game won‚Äôt load then it‚Äôs dead.

content.label:
I wanted to try this game out to see how fun it was based on the positive reviews, and unfortunately, that never happened. I tried downloading the game SEVEN times, and it seemed promising at first when I was able to enter the main menu, but then the game crashed when I tried to start a race. After that, the game wouldn‚Äôt open. I said to myself ‚Äúoh well, some games don‚Äôt always download right the first time‚Äù so I reinstalled the game. This time, it downloaded the content, but then the game froze while it was loading. By now I was getting suspicious that this racing game server was malfunctioning, and that proved to be more and more evident until the 7th time I tried to install this game, in which it wouldn‚Äôt even download the content anymore. I killed 50% of my iPad‚Äôs battery trying to get this game to work, but no luck.
As of this moment, I am pronouncing this racing game as ‚Äúdead‚Äù and unless you want extreme stress and anger, I suggest you avoid downloading this game.
This is one of my favorite games ever, it‚Äôs so fun and adictive

This game is extremely fun! Love this game soooooo much! Although, there are way to many bugs, I haven‚Äôt been able to do a single race in the last 24ish hours because the game keeps crashing. If they fix the bugs I‚Äôd definitely give it five stars!

title.label: Account back up failed - need more backup methods

content.label:
I was really enjoying the game and played many hours and then the most recent update (7/16/2020) caused me to log in to the game again. After logging in using the Apple ID method, which I had previously secured my account with, I was sent to the tutorial and prompted to start a new game.

I used the recover account feature with no success either. I was unable to sign in with Facebook because I am not a Facebook user. Additional account back up sign in methods would have been more useful.

I love this game and highly recommend it to any Motorsport fan. However, I opened the app today and it had deleted all my progress, everything was gone. I signed in with my Apple ID so theoretically it should‚Äôve saved it but it was all gone. Really disappointing because I was decently far into the game and I don‚Äôt know if I want to start all over.
I just got the new update and it erased my data. Put so much time into this game and I hate how it‚Äôs all gone.

I have played many racing games over the years, but this one blew me away. I like the many features and car designs, and the graphics are pretty good. The only things I thinks should be added are an ability to design your own liveries, and maybe some more car types. It would also be nice for there to be more drivers, because it‚Äôs pretty strange when you finish in first and second and third are the same drivers as your first place guy. Overall though I love this game and would recommend it to any racing fans. I don‚Äôt right reviews very often, so I hope this one was an ok one. Great game!

Loved this game until the new update deleted all my progress. All my cars, gear, money, my whole team, gone. Used the same log-in but game started me back tutorial. I will not be starting a new game but recommend this anyone starting now.
HELP!!! I want to keep playing but it tells me to upgrade so I hit the button which takes me to the app screen but there‚Äôs no option for upgrade.?.?.?.?

I love this game sooooooo much, but I was struggling to get money and so I bought the cash injection for 99 cents. I got an email a few hours later saying that I had paid for it, but then I went in the game and no money had been added. I then contacted play sport saying the exact same thing that I am saying here, yet it‚Äôs been almost 3 months and I still haven‚Äôt been contacted or been giving the cash. Although it was just 99 cents so that is not that bad.
I love the game. But it started days ago. I try to run the game but it keeps crashing. I can‚Äôt play anymore.

Just a thing for new players at the start of the game you might have to do a lot of waiting to get more money from your sponsors. One  thing I will love if they can do this is adding the Formula 1 drivers and official car liveries. If they added that I would pay for it as soon as possible anyway have a great day and stay safe. :)

This game is amazingly detailed, it is immersive with real world situations, it is extremely fun to play, the graphics are great, the car options are relatively numerous, then we come to the ‚Äúbut‚Äù part, the dilemmas, sure every race team has plenty of dilemmas, but the way this game uses  them is as a free way to squander players of all of their in game currency, nothing bad for play-to-winners but for those who don‚Äôt spend money on the game it can be challenging to keep your team afloat. For example, one dilemma is that the racing league has found some of your parts to be illegal, okay this can certainly happen, but the fee is either 1 million, yes that‚Äôs right million of in game currency, or 15 tokens that are extremely hard to earn mass quantities of. Plus the penalty for the exact same thing in NASCAR is 200,000 dollars MAX... Otherwise a wonderful, and amazing game.
i love this game so much, the only thing it‚Äôs missing is american stock car racing! i think it would be a great addition to an already amazing game.

title.label: I never leave reviews, but I just love this game too much not to...

content.label: This is a must-have game for anyone who enjoys watching F1, Endurance, or GT racing. Especially if you enjoy the strategical aspects of it. All the different aspects of the sport that don‚Äôt involve the actual driving of the car are addressed in the game, and addressed well. The gameplay is straightforward and intuitive, and encourages you to play around with different strategies to see which work the best. Unlike a lot of other games that involve wait times, you don‚Äôt feel like you‚Äôre doing more waiting than playing. If you do choose to play patiently and wait to upgrade your car and engine more you will definitely reap the rewards. Also the general layout of the game can seem intimidating at first because there‚Äôs so many different aspects, but once you get the hang of it you will really start to feel like a true manager! 10/10 game

content.label: The game ran without any glitches until today, where by simply opening crashes back to the home screen.
